formElement.label: Configuration:
formElement.documentation: The name of the config which holds all the connection information. This must reference a valid existing configuration.

formElement.label: Content Type:
formElement.documentation: Provide the Content-Type required for the request.

formElement.label: Headers:
formElement.documentation: Provide the headers required for the request. Remember to write "Key" whitespace and then "Value", If more than one header, write each header in separate lines.

formElement.label: Content:
formElement.documentation: Provide the Content required for the request.

formElement.label: Source file:
formElement.documentation: Provide the Content required for the request.

formElement.label: Response (output property path):
formElement.documentation: Property to store the server's response.
